snippet: The third president has had a tough time lately, and not just in “Hamilton.” A new book, by a scholarly “dream team,” strives to go beyond hero worship and caricature.
abstract: Book Most Blessed of the Patriarchs: Thomas Jefferson and the Empire of the Imagination by Annette Gordon-Reed and Peter S Onuf goes beyond life of America's third president and discusses life events and philosophies that shaped him.
lead_paragraph: The third president has had a tough time lately, and not just in “Hamilton.” A new book, by a scholarly “dream team,” strives to go beyond hero worship and caricature.

headline.main: Thomas Jefferson, Neither God Nor Devil
headline.print_headline: New Book on Jefferson Portrays Him as Neither God Nor Devil

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Most Blessed of the Patriarchs: Thomas Jefferson and the Empire of the Imagination (Book)
